snippet: Fashion’s purest visionary, Rei Kawakubo, is about to redefine shopping in New York City. Her latest collection for Comme des Garçons is strange, beautiful, singular and, for most of us, unwearable. Yet fashion’s most powerful provocateur is...
lead_paragraph: Fashion’s purest visionary, Rei Kawakubo, is about to redefine shopping in New York City. Her latest collection for Comme des Garçons is strange, beautiful, singular and, for most of us, unwearable. Yet fashion’s most powerful provocateur is also one of its savviest commercial minds.
